VISAGE.Config.Notes: The default name and image are automatically managed. They are sourced from the token's primary settings. If you manually change either the name or image on the main Token Config window and update the token, the changes will be reflected below when you next view this config.

VISAGE.Settings.CleanseScene.Name: [GM Only] Remove all Visage-related data from tokens on current scene
VISAGE.Settings.CleanseScene.Hint: When you check this box and save, you will be asked for confirmation to remove Visage data from tokens in the current scene. This action cannot be undone.
VISAGE.Settings.CleanseAll.Name: [GM Only] Remove all Visage-related data from tokens in all scenes
VISAGE.Settings.CleanseAll.Hint: When you check this box and save, you will be asked for confirmation to remove Visage data from tokens in ALL scenes. This action cannot be undone.

VISAGE.Dialog.CleanseScene.Content: Are you sure you want to remove all Visage data from tokens on the current scene? This action cannot be undone.
VISAGE.Dialog.CleanseAll.Content: Are you sure you want to remove all Visage data from tokens in all scenes? This action cannot be undone.

VISAGE.RingConfig.VideoWarning: Foundry VTT does not currently support animated (video) token art over Dynamic Rings. This token will appear static.
VISAGE.Config.Tooltips.ScaleHeader:
Image Scale relative to Token Dimensions.
100% fits the image to the Width/Height.
Scales greater than 100% will cause the image to overflow the token's grid space making the token appear visually larger than it is.
